resources.string: The goal of the quiz is to find the correct regex that matches target text.

Choose the difficulty on title screen.
 Junior : Easy
 Senior : Midium
 CTO : Hard
1. Quiz Text\n Blue Letter : Target text to be matched\n Gray Letter : Gray letters shouldn\'t be matched.

2. Options
 .*oo: matches "foo" and "boo"
 oo.*: matches only "oo" (doesn't match "f" and "b")
 .* : matches "foo", "boo" and "bar" (too much)

 Target text (blue letter) is "foo" and "boo", so the answer is ".*oo".
Time bar\n The time limit is 90 seconds.
